text: Anahate yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche, te'om sihamtaka sihamtara puraskara paraipurnabharae dana karaiba lagate nija anugrahata arau bechikai pradana karaiba. Arau yisakale (allahara ibadata karaaka) tacchilya jnana karaiche arau ahankara karaiche, sihamtaka te'om kastadayaka sasti diba. Allahara bahirae sihamte nijara babe ana kono abhibharaka arau sahayaka napaba
